title: The Maid and Vampire - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Arrogant Characters   Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Couple Growth   Depictions of Cruelty   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   European Ambience   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Loyal Subordinates   Maids   Manipulative Characters   Master-Servant Relationship   Mature Protagonist   Nobles   Older Love Interests   S*ave Protagonist   S*aves   Strong Love Interests   Transported to Another World   Vampires   Wealthy Characters
author: Dolce Yi   이돌체
description:
Areum has fallen into a strange world called ‘Soltera’ after a car accident. 

She is mistaken for a vampire because of her hair colour, and she is sold to a Duke’s house by a s*ave trader. 

The identity of Millard Travis the master of the Duke’s house that bought her is the one and only vampire in the world! 

Desperate to survive in any way, Areum becomes Millard’s direct servant, vowing to serve him as her master.

 Areum tries to belly up on Millard day by day and his attitude starts to change.>
